message.title: Port
message.content: The port accepts all types of grain. However, its prices are a bit lower than those of the brewery or the mill.

message.title: Stone Circle
message.content:
This stone circle is the oldest man-made structure on the island.
There is not much known about its builders, and its original purpose is subject to a lot of speculation.

message.title: Camera Views
message.content: By pressing C you can switch between an inside and an outside camera. The distance of the outside camera to the vehicle can be adjusted with the mouse wheel.

message.title: Mill
message.content:
In the career mode you can unload wheat, barley or canola here.
Your PDA's price screen informs you about who is currently paying the most for which grain type.

message.title: Farm Machines Trader
message.content:
In the career mode you can invest you hard-earned money in better farm machinery.
Depending on your reputation, you get a larger sum of money from the trader when selling something.
